verses.name: Deuteronomy 6:20
verses.text: And when thy son asketh thee in time to come, saying, What mean the testimonies, and the statutes, and the judgments, which the Lord our God hath commanded you?

verses.name: Deuteronomy 6:21
verses.text: Then thou shalt say unto thy son, We were Pharaoh’s bondmen in Egypt; and the Lord brought us out of Egypt with a mighty hand:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 6:22
verses.text: And the Lord shewed signs and wonders, great and sore, upon Egypt, upon Pharaoh, and upon all his household, before our eyes:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 6:23
verses.text: And he brought us out from thence, that he might bring us in, to give us the land which he sware unto our fathers.
